leadingComments.value: Mostly sourced from PatrolJS at the moment. TODO: come back and reimplement this as an incomplete
funnel algorithm so astar checks can be more accurate.
Right vertex just crossed over the left vertex, so the left vertex should
now be part of the path.

trailingComments.value: Restart scan from portal left point.
Make current left the new apex.

leadingComments.value: Restart scan from portal left point.
Make current left the new apex.
Left vertex just crossed over the right vertex, so the right vertex should
now be part of the path
